title: Getting Married üíç
description: Marriage is a significant life event that involves legal, financial, and personal planning. It marks the beginning of a new chapter and partnership.
sentences: Open communication about finances, goals, and expectations is crucial before marriage.
Decide on a budget for the wedding to avoid starting your married life in debt.
Understand the legal requirements for registering a marriage in India.
Planning a wedding involves coordinating multiple vendors and timelines.
Pre-marital counseling can be a helpful step for many couples.
dos: Discuss your financial habits and goals with your partner.
Create a realistic wedding budget and track your expenses.
Plan for your life after the wedding, not just the event itself.
donts: Don't go into major debt for a lavish wedding.
Don't try to please everyone; it's your and your partner's day.
Avoid making major life decisions right after getting married.
Don't ignore red flags or communication issues before the wedding.
